DLC1.OneTrueKing: Palace of the One True King

LivingStone.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/LithicSignet/Ring_LithicSignet
LivingStone.notes: Found in The Lament, The Twisted Chantry, or The Chimney locations on Yaesha at the end of a hidden passageway. To open the passageway, locate a room with 4 statues of Pan Warriors and shoot the crystals in their foreheads, opening a hidden stair case in the middle of the room.

EmpressStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/RedDoeSigil/Amulet_RedDoeSigil
EmpressStory.notes: Rewarded by giving the Ornate Lockbox item (unopened) found in The Widow's Court location on Yaesha, to The Eternal Empress at the Red Throne location on Yaesha.

RavagerStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/FrivolousBand/Ring_FrivolousBand
RavagerStory.notes: Rewarded by speaking with Bedel of the Vaunnt in The Forbidden Grove location on Yaesha, after reviving the Red Doe in the Corrupted Ravager boss fight. Upon first meeting Bedel in The Forbidden Grove, the player must choose funny / sarcastic dialogue options and accept his quest, prior to reviving the Doe. Then upon speaking with him again, the player must choose the "Maybe..." dialogue option when asked if the player saved the Doe.

RavagerStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/LodestoneRing/Ring_LodestoneRing
RavagerStory.notes: Rewarded by speaking with Bedel of The Vaunnt in the Forbidden Grove location on Yaesha while wearing the Lodestone Crown armor piece.

RavagerStory.name: /Items/Weapons/Melee/Standard/Spear/RebellionSpear/Weapon_RebellionSpear
RavagerStory.notes: Granted as Reward by Bedel of the Vaunnt for saving the Doe during the Corrupted Ravager boss fight.

Ravager.name: /Items/Weapons/Melee/Special/FeralJudgment/Weapon_FeralJudgment
Ravager.notes: Crafted by McCabe at Ward 13. Requires the Ravager's Maw item, obtained from performing an Alt Kill on the Corrupted Ravager boss in the Ravager's Lair location on Yaesha. The Alt Kill is performed by shooting the Ravager to initate the fight, killing the Red Doe before the Ravager is able to eat it, and then killing the Ravager boss.

RootHorror.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/TearOfKaeula/Ring_TearOfKaeula
RootHorror.notes: Found in the Kaeula's Rest location on Yaesha, at the foot of a statue, beneath a waterfall.

CathedralOfSeasons.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/RingOfOmens/Ring_RingOfOmens
CathedralOfSeasons.notes: Found in the Cathedral of Omens location on Yaesha, behind a red trap door on the ground, after solving the Blood Moon puzzle. The trapdoor will only open during the Blood Moon event.

TheChimney.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/DownwardSpiral/Amulet_DownwardSpiral
TheChimney.notes: Found in the Chimney location on Yaesha, hidden halfway down the staircase in the Crystal Elevator event.

TheLament.name: /Items/Armor/Armor_Head_LodestoneCrown
TheLament.notes: On the boat inside Kolkets locked room

TheTangle.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/FullMoonCirclet/Amulet_FullMoonCirclet
TheTangle.notes: Found in The Imperial Gardens location on Yaesha, in a hidden room below a trapdoor marked with a golden full moon crest. The trapdoor will only open during the Blood Moon event.

RedDoeStatue.name: /Items/Gems/Ranged/MetaGems/GhostShell/MetaGem_GhostShell
RedDoeStatue.notes: Rewarded by interacting with the Rotten Thaen Fruit item. The item can be found in The Widow's Court location on Yaesha at the end of a secret passage. To unlock the passage, wear the Red Doe's Sigil amulet in front of the statue of the Ravager and the Red Doe.

Nimue.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/OneTrueKingSigil/Amulet_OneTrueKingSigil
Nimue.notes: Give Faerin and Faelin's Sigil to Nimue

Nimue.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/NimuesRibbon/Amulet_NimuesRibbon
Nimue.notes: Give Silver and Gold Ribbon to Nimue

Nimue.name: /Items/Weapons/Melee/Standard/Sword/AssassinsDagger/Weapon_AssassinsDagger
Nimue.notes: Give Council Chambers dagger to Nimue

Nimue.name: /Items/Weapons/LongGuns/Special/CrescentMoon/Weapon_CrescentMoon
Nimue.notes: Use Dreamcatcher on Nimue while she is sleeping

Nimue.name: /Items/Armor/TrueCrimsonCrown/Armor_Head_TrueCrimsonCrown
Nimue.notes: Give Crimson Guard Shroud and Crown of the Red Prince to Nimue

NightWeaver.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BitterMemento/Ring_BitterMemento
NightWeaver.notes: Offer Memoriam Medallion Key to Nightweaver's Web.

Nightweb.name: /Items/Weapons/Melee/Special/Dreamcatcher/Weapon_Dreamcatcher
Nightweb.notes: Rewarded by offering the Nightweaver Stone Doll item found in the Tormented Asylum location on Losomn to the Nightweaver's Web event found in the Tormented Asylum location on Losomn. This can be done in any mode that has rolled both locations.

Nightweb.name: /Items/Armor/Base/RelicTesting/TormentedHeart/Relic_Consumable_TormentedHeart
Nightweb.notes: Rewarded by offering the Overide Pin item found in the Timeless Horizon location on N'Erud to the Nightweaver's Web event found in the Tormented Asylum location on Losomn. This must be done on a campaign that has rolled both locations.

Nightweb.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/RingOfRetribution/Ring_RingOfRetribution
Nightweb.notes: Rewarded by offering the Dria's Anklet item found in the Harvester's Reach location on Losomn to the Nightweaver's Web event found in the Tormented Asylum location on Losomn. This can be done in any mode that has rolled both locations.

Nightweb.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/NightweaversGrudge/Amulet_NightweaversGrudge
Nightweb.notes: Rewarded by offering the Kolkets Razor item found in The Lament location on Yaesha to the Nightweaver's Web event found in the Tormented Asylum location on Losomn. This must be done on a campaign that has rolled both locations.

Nightweb.name: /Items/Weapons/HandGuns/Special/RunePistol/Weapon_RunePistol
Nightweb.notes: Rewarded by offering the Ravenous Medallion item found in the Great Hall location on Losomn to the Nightweaver's Web event found in the Tormented Asylum location on Losomn. This can be done in any mode that has rolled both locations.

AllFatherStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/CatalogersJewel/Ring_CatalogersJewel
AllFatherStory.notes: near entrance to The Great Sewer in Beatific Palace

AllFatherStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/OneEyedJokerIdol/Amulet_OneEyedJokerIdol
AllFatherStory.notes: Jester Card Doors - face mask door

AllFatherStory.name: /Items/Gems/Melee/MetaGems/Misfortune/MetaGem_Misfortune
AllFatherStory.notes: Jester Card Doors - devil horns door

AllFatherStory.name: /Items/Armor/Base/RelicTesting/UnsulliedHeart/Relic_Consumable_UnsulliedHeart
AllFatherStory.notes: Wear OneTrueKing(AM) and both Faerin/Faelin(RI) in the Palace Courtyard

AllFatherStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/ShadeBloomFloret/Amulet_ShadeBloomCrystal
AllFatherStory.notes: on the bone pile where the Jester sits in Beatific Palace

RisingTides.name: /Items/Weapons/HandGuns/Special/Meridian/Weapon_Meridian
RisingTides.notes: wait 90m for the water to rise

TheCoreStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/DowngradedRing/Ring_DowngradedRing
TheCoreStory.notes: Rewarded by speaking with the Custodian at the Ascension Spire location on N'Erud, after defeating Sha'Hala.

ElevatorShaft.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/PropulsionLoop/Ring_PropulsionLoop
ElevatorShaft.note: Found in the Astropath's Respite, Terminus Station, Tower of the Unseen, or Spectrum Nexus locations on N'Erud, in a hidden passage halfway up an elevator shaft. Jump from the elevator through the broken wall section then proceed onward. Eventually, you will find a second elevator which can go either up or down. In order to retrieve the ring you want to ride the elevator up which can accessed by triggering the elevator to go down first. Step on the elevator but step or dodge backward so as to not ride it down. Wait for the next elevator platform to arrive before taking it up and retrieving the ring.

SewageFacility.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/GeneratingBand/Ring_GeneratingBand
SewageFacility.notes: Found in The Hatchery, Void Vessel Facility, Vault of the Formless, or The Putrid Domain locations on N'Erud during the Flooded Room event. Once the event starts, you will have one chance to collect the items in the room before it fills with water.

Extermination.name: /Items/Traits/Core/Leech/Trait_Leech
Extermination.notes: Get killed by getting locked in the purge

Train.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/Hyperconductor/Amulet_Hyperconductor
Train.notes: Found in the Terminus Station location on N'Erud, hidden in a crawlspace to the left of a ladder, in the Train event.

TheCustodian.name: /Items/Mods/Overflow/Mod_Overflow
TheCustodian.notes: Crafted by McCabe at Ward 13. Requires the Escalation Circuit item, found in the Phantom Wasteland/Ascension Spire location on N'Erud, located in a secret room beneath the Custodian NPC. Once in the secret room, take the elevator on the right to travel down, then imediately look for a crawl space to the right.

DrzyrReplicator.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/VoidIdol/Amulet_VoidIdol
DrzyrReplicator.notes: Crafted at the Drzyr Replicator at the Ascension Spire location on N'Erud. Requires the Shining Essence Echo item, granted after defeating Tal'Ratha. The Drzyr Replicator can be found in a hidden passage in the Custodian's tower.

TalRatha.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/NavigatorsPendant/Amulet_NavigatorsPendant
TalRatha.notes: get eaten while wearing rusted navigators

Dranception.name: /Items/Weapons/Anguish/Weapon_Anguish
Dranception.notes: Enter the FinalDream and find the Drans in each world.

BurningCity.name: /Quests/Quest_Event_Dranception/Items/Quest_Item_DLC_DreamLevel
BurningCity.notes: Use liquid escape in the Manor, then Escape the dream through the crystal.

BurningCity.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/CrimsonDreamstone/Ring_CrimsonDreamstone
BurningCity.notes: Use liquid escape in the manor.

Halls_DLC.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/ShaedStone/Ring_ShaedStone
Halls_DLC.notes: Shoot the invisible golden pot in the reflection you see on the mirrored floor.

GardenMaze.name: /Items/Mods/Mod_KnightGuard/Mod_KnightGuard
GardenMaze.notes: Wear the Red Prince Crown in the room on Golden Hall.

Lighthouse.name: /Items/Weapons/Buster/Weapon_Sparkfire
Lighthouse.notes: Outside the lighthouse down the path, around a rock is a secret door, interact with item to get the key to open the door

SewerChamber.name: /Items/Gems/Melee/Guts/MetaGem_Guts
SewerChamber.notes: Return to dran the woman after destroying both of the totems.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Archetypes/Ritualist/Armor/Armor_Head_Ritualist
ForlornCoastStory.notes: Shoot hanging body under the bridge before Nimue.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Archetypes/Ritualist/Armor/Armor_Body_Ritualist
ForlornCoastStory.notes: Shoot hanging body under the bridge before Nimue.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Archetypes/Ritualist/Armor/Armor_Legs_Ritualist
ForlornCoastStory.notes: Shoot hanging body under the bridge before Nimue.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Archetypes/Ritualist/Armor/Armor_Gloves_Ritualist
ForlornCoastStory.notes: Shoot hanging body under the bridge before Nimue.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/DigestedHogLure/Ring_DigestedHogLure
ForlornCoastStory.notes: Kill all the hogs by the Anchor statue.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Traits/DarkPact/Trait_DarkPact
ForlornCoastStory.notes: Shoot all three bells in Forlorn Coast to complete the Bells event.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BridgeWardensCrest/Ring_BridgeWardensCrest
ForlornCoastStory.notes: Get to the top of the bridge without killing any fae, then speak to feastmaster elite.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Weapons/Melee/Special/AbyssalHook/Weapon_AbyssalHook
ForlornCoastStory.notes: It can be found in one of the rooms of the sewer-like area, in the manticore lair.

ForlornCoastStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/ElevatedRing/Ring_ElevatedRing
ForlornCoastStory.notes: Forlorn Coast- Mournful Promenade, Use the Elevator at top to get there.

Leywise.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/WhiteGlassBead/Ring_WhiteGlassBead
Leywise.notes: Bring the feastmaster leftovers to Leywise.

Leywise.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/IndexOfTheScribe/Amulet_IndexOfTheScribe
Leywise.notes: Bring the Scribes Tome back to Leywise, do NOT open the tome.

Leywise.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BurdenOfTheSciolist/Ring_BurdenOfTheSciolist
Leywise.notes: Open the Scribes Tome and give the medallion to Leywise immediately

Leywise.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/RingOfInfiniteDamage/Ring_RingOfInfiniteDamage
Leywise.notes: Open the Scribes Tome and reject the first time Leywise asks, then give the medallion to Leywise the second time he asks.

Preacher.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BandOfTheFanatic/Ring_BandOfTheFanatic
Preacher.notes: Wear full Zealot armor, then speak to Preacher after his speech.

Preacher.name: /Items/Armor/TopHat/Armor_Head_TopHat
Preacher.notes: Shoot the hat off the Preachers head

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Armor/RedPrinceArmor/Armor_Head_CrimsonGuard
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Kill the one true king, give the red prince 3 coins, then return to the palace.

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Armor/RedPrinceArmor/Armor_Body_CrimsonGuard
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Kill the one true king, give the red prince 3 coins, then return to the palace.

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Armor/RedPrinceArmor/Armor_Legs_CrimsonGuard
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Kill the one true king, give the red prince 3 coins, then return to the palace.

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Armor/RedPrinceArmor/Armor_Gloves_CrimsonGuard
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Kill The One True King, give the red prince 3 coins, then return to the palace.

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BurdenOfTheDeparted/Ring_BurdenOfTheDeparted
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Defeat The One True King while having Burden of the Divine equipped.

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Relics/PaperHeart/Relic_Consumable_PaperHeart
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Find the scribes book and get the medallion out of it, then open the door in the palace.

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/Cost_Of_Betrayal/Amulet_CostOfBetrayal
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Shoot one of the dead council members bodies.

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Weapons/Melee/Special/Wrathbringer/Weapon_Wrathbringer
OneTrueKingStory.notes: The One True King Alt kill reward

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/GiftOfTheUnbound/Amulet_GiftOfTheUnbound
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Agree to kill Nimue, but then kill The One True King instead and return to Nimue.

OneTrueKingStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/JewelOfTheBeholden/Ring_JewelOfTheBeholden
OneTrueKingStory.notes: Kill The One True King, then speak to Nimue

LuminousValeStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/WornDogTags/Amulet_WornDogTags
LuminousValeStory.notes: Return to Private Jack Driver after deciding Lydusa's fate.

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Quests/Quest_Story_DLC2/LoreItem_BP/Pan_Interactive_Note_Walt1
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Give to Dwell to receive Echo of the Forest

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Quests/Quest_Story_DLC2/LoreItem_BP/Pan_Interactive_Note_Walt2
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Give to Dwell to receive Echo of the Forest

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Quests/Quest_Story_DLC2/LoreItem_BP/Pan_Interactive_Note_Walt3
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Give to Dwell to receive Echo of the Forest

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/EchoOfTheForest/Amulet_EchoOfTheForest
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Given by Dwell in Ward13 after providing him 3 pieces of Trinity Memento

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/StoneshapersChisel/Amulet_StoneshapersChisel
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Interact with Uuqul when cursed with Touch of Lydusa.

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Items/Archetypes/Invoker/Armor/Armor_Head_Invoker
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Inside a tunnel in lower Ancient Canopy

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Items/Archetypes/Invoker/Armor/Armor_Body_Invoker
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Inside a tunnel in lower Ancient Canopy

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Items/Archetypes/Invoker/Armor/Armor_Gloves_Invoker
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Inside a tunnel in lower Ancient Canopy

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Items/Archetypes/Invoker/Armor/Armor_Legs_Invoker
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Inside a tunnel in lower Ancient Canopy

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Items/Weapons/Thorn/Weapon_Thorn
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Climbing towards the Kuri Kuri nest, DO NOT grab the egg after the bird leaves. Return later when you hear the bird.

AncientCanopyStory.name: /Items/Weapons/TrinityCrossbow/Weapon_TrinityCrossbow
AncientCanopyStory.notes: Found in a hidden chamber after collecting all three Trinity Mementos.

LydusaTemple.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BloodlessKingsVow/Ring_BloodlessKingsVow
LydusaTemple.notes: Acquired by defeating The Bloodless Heir aberration inside Lydusa's Temple

LydusaTemple.name: /Items/Armor/BloodlessCrown/Armor_Head_BloodlessCrown
LydusaTemple.notes: After opening the door that requires five braziers, at the Altar by the offering vessel.

LydusaTemple.name: /Items/Weapons/Flail_Mirage/Weapon_Mirage
LydusaTemple.notes: Light all 5 braziers in Goddess's Rest to open the locked door and offer Cherished Fracture on the shrine.

TombRaid.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/DarkSeaArmadaCrest/Ring_DarkSeaArmadaCrest
TombRaid.notes: At the end of the last gauntlet (4th checkpoint)

Island_DLC.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/TokenOfFavor/Ring_TokenOfFavor
Island_DLC.notes: Can be found at the side of the giant deer statue.

Island_DLC.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/CervineKeepsake/Amulet_CervineKeepsake
Island_DLC.notes: In the Deserted Atelier, when you come to the statue of the doe, put on the Red Doe Sigil.

Rothinderahenwalt.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/FeatheryBinding/Ring_FeatheryBinding
Rothinderahenwalt.notes: Given by Walt after Lydusa has been defeated.

DLC2Story.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/SoulStone/Amulet_SoulStone
DLC2Story.notes: Cleanse the Profane Soul Stone at The Keeper within the Labyrinth

DLC2Story.name: /Items/Relics/ProfaneHeart/Relic_Consumable_ProfaneHeart
DLC2Story.notes: Refuse to cleanse the Profane Soul Stone at The Keeper within the Labyrinth

DLC2Story.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/TearOfLydusa/Ring_TearOfLydusa
DLC2Story.notes: In the area where you fought Lydusa, return after the fight to find the ring.

DLC2Story.name: /Items/Armor/MudtoothsHat/Armor_Head_MudtoothsHat
DLC2Story.notes: Talk to Mudtooth after completing the Forgotten Kingdom storyline.

DLC2Story.name: /Items/Weapons/Monolith/Weapon_Monolith
DLC2Story.notes: Defeat Lydusa while her face is blue.

DLC2Story.name: /Items/Weapons/Polygun/Weapon_Polygun
DLC2Story.notes: Found on an altar hidden in the Labyrinth.

DLC2Story.name: /Items/Traits/Resolute/Trait_Resolute
DLC2Story.notes: Destroy fifteen Traveler statues (appear when you die with Lydusa's Curse)

Ward13.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/TarnishedRing/Ring_TarnishedRing
Ward13.notes: Rewarded by speaking with Earl at Ward 13 and listening to his rabbit story. He can either be found sleeping in bed, or hanging on the walk way above the merchant Whispers. He will not speak to you while he sleeps, and while away, he may be resistant at first to telling you his story.

Ward13.name: /Items/Armor/Base/RelicTesting/RipenedHeart/Relic_Consumable_RipenedHeart
Ward13.notes: Rewarded by the Thaen Fruit Tree event in Ward 13, after planting the Thaen Seed quest item in the ground of the garden in Ward 13. The Thaen Seed can be Rewarded by interacting with the Ornate Lock Box quest item, and inserting the Ornate Key quest item. Both of which can be found in the Widow's Court location on Yaesha. The player must grow and collect the Celestial Thaen Fruit consumable, a total of 3 times, before the Ripened Heart can be grown. Each fruit takes a set amount of real world hours to grow.

Mudtooth.name: /Items/Materials/Engrams/Item_HiddenContainer_Material_Engram_Gunslinger
Mudtooth.notes: Crafted by Wallace at Ward 13. Requires the Worn Cylinder item, purchased from Mudtooth at Ward 13. Available for purchase after exhausting his second set of stories.

Mudtooth.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/GunslingersCharm/Amulet_GunslingersCharm
Mudtooth.notes: Rewarded by speaking with Mudtooth at Ward 13, and exhausting his second set of stories, in the campaign mode. The second set of stories is available to the player after completing their second biome in the campaign.

Mudtooth.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/GunslingersRing/Ring_GunslingersRing
Mudtooth.notes: Rewarded by speaking with Mudtooth at Ward 13, and exhausting his first set of stories, in the campaign mode.

Mudtooth.name: /Items/Materials/Engrams/Item_HiddenContainer_Material_Engram_Handler
Mudtooth.notes: Crafted by Wallace at Ward 13. Requires the Old Whistle item, purchased from Mudtooth at Ward 13.

Brabus.name: /Items/Materials/Engrams/Item_HiddenContainer_Material_Engram_Hunter
Brabus.notes: Crafted by Wallace at Ward 13. Requires the Rusty Medal item, purchased from Brabus at Ward 13.

Reggie.name: /Items/Materials/Engrams/Item_HiddenContainer_Material_Engram_Challenger
Reggie.notes: Crafted by Wallace at Ward 13. Requires the Old Metal Tool item, purchased from Reggie at Ward 13.

Reggie.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/ButchersFetish/Amulet_ButchersFetish
Reggie.notes: Purchased from Reggie at Ward 13 after completing the campaign on Veteran difficulty.

Reggie.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/LetosAmulet/Amulet_LetosAmulet
Reggie.notes: Purchased from Reggie at Ward 13 after performing a failed roll 100 times, while wearing the Leto Mark II armor set.

Reggie.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BlackCatBand/Ring_BlackCatBand
Reggie.notes: Purchased from Reggie at Ward 13 after dying 15 times.

Reggie.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BandOfAccord/Ring_BandOfAccord
Reggie.notes: Purchased from Reggie at Ward 13 after performing the High Five emote in co-op.

Reggie.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/OnyxPendulum/Amulet_OnyxPendulum
Reggie.notes: Purchased from Reggie at Ward 13 after completing the campaign on Nightmare difficulty.

Reggie.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/NightmareSpiral/Amulet_NightmareSpiral
Reggie.notes: Purchased from Reggie at Ward 13 after defeating all bosses at least once.

Reggie.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BrightSteelRing/Ring_BrightSteelRing
Reggie.notes: Purchased from Reggie at Ward 13 after completing 15 biomes on any difficulty.

Reggie.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/DevouringLoop/Ring_DevouringLoop
Reggie.notes: Purchased from Reggie at Ward 13 after completing the campaign on Apocalypse difficulty.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/AmberMoonstone/Ring_AmberMoonstone
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BraidedThorns/Ring_BraidedThorns
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/AkariWarBand/Ring_AkariWarBand
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/CompulsionLoop/Ring_CompulsionLoop
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/RockOfAnguish/Ring_RockOfAnguish
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/DeceiversBand/Ring_DeceiversBand
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/BlessedRing/Ring_BlessedRing
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/RingOfFlawedBeauty/Ring_RingOfFlawedBeauty
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/DeadKingsMemento/Ring_DeadKingsMemento
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Rings/MechanicsCog/Ring_MechanicsCog
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Armor/Base/RelicTesting/EnlargedHeart/Relic_Consumable_EnlargedHeart
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13 after completing 5 biomes. - Editors Note: Theres debate on whether the actual requirement is 5 biomes completed or 5 biomes unlocked, ie, reaching Root Earth in the campaign. Feel free to open an issue in the github repo if you have strong reason to believe one of these is the correct requirement.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/BrokenPocketWatch/Amulet_BrokenPocketWatch
Cass.notes: Purchased from Cass at Ward 13. Merchant has a random chance to have this item in stock.

Cass.name: /Items/Trinkets/Amulets/AbrasiveWhetstone/Amulet_AbrasiveWhetstone
